Posts.EditableText:
Purpose: if you fail to come up with ideas for the scenery and objects of your game, you can always quick insert this long list into a randomizer (suggestion: type list randomizer in google) and then use what is at the top of the list for entities in your environment. This list doesn't cover everything there is and mostly covers things that would be found in medieval times or earlier ages than modern times. This list is a work in progress, but it should help you figure out what you could put into your environments you create, feel free to create your own lists that have themes and post them here, this particular list is sort of an everything list.

This took a very long time to make, please enjoy and put it to use. I would be very happy if I started seeing additional lists here, the lists really make the brainstorming for area ideas a lot easier.

Notes: you will take notice of HP, DAM, and other stats attached to the creatures listed here, ignore that because that was for an old project. All that is important is the names of the creatures themselves. This list is also only partly ordered, you'll come to find that it isn't alphabetical although it could deceive you into thinking it was, this is because the job proved to be too tedious after awhile and forced me to only make it semi alphabetical and not 100% alphabetical. You'll notice some things are far too specific, for example the 'Abaciscus Moth', you can ignore these or simply add a moth in your game without further detail. And finally be aware this is the first list like this that I have ever created, so naturally it has plenty of issues.

[code:10vcxqat]
Aardwolf
Aba Cloth – Camel Hair
Abaciscus Moth
Abacus
Abalone
Abandoned Ship

Posts.HTML:
Purpose: if you fail to come up with ideas for the scenery and objects of your game, you can always quick insert this long list into a randomizer (suggestion: type list randomizer in google) and then use what is at the top of the list for entities in your environment. This list doesn't cover everything there is and mostly covers things that would be found in medieval times or earlier ages than modern times. This list is a work in progress, but it should help you figure out what you could put into your environments you create, feel free to create your own lists that have themes and post them here, this particular list is sort of an everything list.

This took a very long time to make, please enjoy and put it to use. I would be very happy if I started seeing additional lists here, the lists really make the brainstorming for area ideas a lot easier.

Notes: you will take notice of HP, DAM, and other stats attached to the creatures listed here, ignore that because that was for an old project. All that is important is the names of the creatures themselves. This list is also only partly ordered, you'll come to find that it isn't alphabetical although it could deceive you into thinking it was, this is because the job proved to be too tedious after awhile and forced me to only make it semi alphabetical and not 100% alphabetical. You'll notice some things are far too specific, for example the 'Abaciscus Moth', you can ignore these or simply add a moth in your game without further detail. And finally be aware this is the first list like this that I have ever created, so naturally it has plenty of issues.

just to not have a huge post, use the 'code box' code for your post:

[.code]your code or mass of text wall here[/code.]

but without the periods in the brackets, which will produce this:

[code:3vtbr5qy]your code or mass of text wall here[/code:3vtbr5qy]

to show that it'll scroll for you:

[code:3vtbr5qy]q
q
q
q
